issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
NOTIFICATION_LOG cleanup interval is hardcoded as 60s and is too small. It should be set to several hours or else the number of metastore calls would be too high and impact other operations.
Make it configurable item and set it as 2Hrs.
fields.summary: NOTIFICATION_LOG cleanup interval is hardcoded as 60s and is too small.
